A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: My favorite Star Wars movie is Empire Strikes Back.  This movie was not well received by all critics.  Neither is The Last Jedi.  I've seen it twice.  It grew on me a ton\, the 2nd time.  Luke Skywalker is my favorite character of all time in any genre.  I loved Mark Hamill's performance and I loved Rian Johnson's take on the character.  Daisy Ridley and Adam Driver were great.  I could have done without the Finn and Rose scene on Canto Bight\, but I loved the new Rose character.  Look this is Star Wars - and I felt like a kid again.  I was hoping Kylo Ren would become Ben Solo again.  I was hoping Luke Skywalker would save the galaxy.  You know what?  Life isn't perfect and neither is this movie but it's pretty damn good.
